Title: Principal SDE, SalesForce
JD:
About the job
    


          Do you want to change the world? We do, too.

SunPower is changing the way our world is powered every day with a passionate and driven team of more than 3,660 full-time employees in North America and the Philippines. SunPower provides world-class solar solutions to residential customers across the U.S. with a commitment to a superior customer experience. We welcome forward thinkers, freedom chasers and all those demanding better, cleaner energy to join us.

Description

SunPower Corporation seeks an experienced Principal Salesforce Developer Engineer to enhance and maintain the Salesforce platform for the New Homes Operations workstream. This role will report to Senior Manager, Software Engineering.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following (other duties may be assigned):
Design and develop solutions on the Salesforce platform to meet end-to-end process requirements to support a globalized operations process.Conduct technology/solution evaluation and recommend the appropriate solution to support operations business needs.Work with product owners to ensure that relevant information systems effectively serve business needs.Project member through all phases of the project lifecycle, including Analysis, Requirements Definition, Design, Build & Test, Conversion, and Deployment for operations delivery functionality.Minimum requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Sciences or equivalent field, plus 4+ years of relevant development experience on the Salesforce platform.Engineering degree preferred OR equivalent combination of education and years of related experience. Preferred requirements:
Knowledge of Salesforce.com platform and experience coding with Apex, Visual Force & Lightning components.Experience in using efficient methodologies (e.g. Agile – test-driven development) and continuous deployment tools (e.g. Git/Jenkins/SourceTree/BitBucket/etc.)Experience in integrating systems using Web Services and Middleware.Understanding of object-oriented concepts, abstraction/inheritance, as well as experience with object-oriented languages.Solid understanding of web technologies, such as JavaScript, CSS, HTML5, XML, JavaScript, JSON, and/or AjaxStrong analytical skills and attention to detail.Fun to work with and sense of humor appreciated.Familiarity with building and using REST APIs.Ideal Personal Characteristics:
Excellent organizational skills. Self-motivated with the ability to work independently with minimal supervision.Good people management skills, including recruiting, mentoring, and career development.Deep expertise and successful working experience with software providers covering all phases of the systems development lifecycles
